verses.1: Amauʼ beh tawh kizui-in Judah miteʼ ngah pen leitaw lamah Edom gamgi ciang hi a, leitaw lam a gamla penna munah Zin gam ciang ban hi.
verses.2: Leitaw lam a gamgi pen Ci Tuipi mong, leitaw lam a sun tuidawk pan kipan hi.
verses.3: Leitaw lam Akrabbim kah tohna ah pai khia-in, Zin dong ban a, Kadesh-barnea leitaw lamah Hezron dung tawnin Addar ciang dong pai to-in Karka lamah kihei a,
verses.4: Azmon ciang dong pai-in Egypt lui ah suak khia a, tuipi ah a mong bei hi. Hih pen amauʼ leitaw lam gamgi hi ding hi.
verses.5: Tua ciangin nisuahna lam gamgi pen Jordan tunna ciang dong Ci Tuipi ahi hi. Leilu lam pang gamgi pen Jordan tunna tuipi dawk panin kipan hi.
verses.6: Beth-hoglah lamah a gamgi pai to a, Betharabah leilu lam pangah paisuak hi. Tua ciangin Reuben tapa Bohanʼ Suangpi dongah a gamgi pai to-in,
verses.7: Akhor Kuam panin Debir ah pai to a, leilu lam manawhin, tua kuam leitaw lam pangah a om, Adummim kah tohna gal khat ah a om Gilgal lamah kihei hi. Tua ciangin En-shemesh lui dung ah gamgi pai-in Enrogel ah tawp hi.
verses.8: Tua ciangin Jebus (Jerusalem a cihna) liangko leitaw lam Hinnomʼ tapaʼ kuamah gamgi pai to-in, Refaim kuam leilu lam mong, nitumna lam Hinnom Kuam gal khat ah a kikhung mual dawnah gamgi pai to hi.
verses.9: Tua ciangin mual dawn panin Neftoah lui ah gamgi kikhung a, tua panin Efron Mual khuapite ah pai a, tua ciangin Baalah (Kiriath-jearim a cihna) lamah gamgi kawi kual hi.
verses.10: Tua ciangin Baalah nitumna lam Seir Mual ah gamgi kual a, tua panin pai suakin Jearim Mual (Khesalon a cihna) liangko leilu lamah pai-in, Beth-shemesh ah pai suk a, Timnah kiangah paisuak hi.
verses.11: Ekron leilu lam mual liangko ah a gamgi paikhia a, tua ciangin Shikkeron ah gamgi kawi kualin, Baalah Mual ah paisuak a, Jabneel ah leng khia-in tuipi ah a gamgi tawp hi.
verses.12: Tua ciangin nitumna gamgi pen Tuipi Lian dung teng ahi hi. Hih pen amauʼ beh tawh kizui-in Judah miteʼ kiimah a gamgi ahi hi.
verses.13: Topa in Joshua tungah a thupiak bangin Jefunneh tapa Kaleb tungah amah in Judah mite lakah tanh khat Kiriath-arba, Hebron a cihna, (Arba pen Anakʼ pa hi) pia hi.
verses.14: Tua lai panin Kaleb in Anakʼ tapa thumte Sheshai, Ahiman le Talmai, Anakʼ suanlekhakte a hawl khia hi.
verses.15: Tua lai panin Debir sunga a teeng mite a sim dingin amah kuan to hi. Debir pen a nidangin Kiriath-sefer kici hi.
verses.16: Kaleb in, “Kiriath-sefer vat gawpin a la zo mi tungah ka tanu Aksah a zi dingin ka pia ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.17: Tua ciangin Kalebʼ sanggampa Kenazʼ tapa Othniel in la a, amah in a zi dingin a tanu Aksah a pia hi.
verses.18: Tua nu ama kiangah a pai ding ciangin ama paʼ tung panin lo khat a nget ding hah gen hi. A la tung panin tua nu a kum ciangin Kaleb in tua nu kiangah, “Bang ut na hi hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.19: Amah in, “Letsong khat hong pia in. Negeb gamah kei hong koih na hih buangin ciktui khukte zong hong pia in,” a ci hi. Tua ciangin Kaleb in tua nu tungah ciktui tungnungte le ciktui nuainungte a pia hi.
verses.20: Hihte pen amauʼ beh tawh kizui-in Judah minamteʼ gamhluah ahi hi.
verses.21: Leitaw lam mongciik, Edom gamgi lamah Judah minamteʼ neih khuapite: Kabzeel, Eder, Jagur,
verses.32: Lebaoth, Shilhim, Ain le Rimmon: a vekpi-in khuapi sawm nih le kua, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.33: Tua ciangin lei niamna lamah Eshtaol, Zorah, Ashnah,
verses.36: Shaaraim, Adithaim, Gederah le Gederothaim: khuapi sawm le li, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.41: Gederoth, Beth-dagon, Naamah le Makkedah: khuapi sawm le guk, a khuaneute tawh zong ahi hi.
verses.44: Keilah, Akzib le Mareshah: khuapi kua, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.45: Ekron a khuapite le a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.46: Ekron panin tuipi dong, Ashdod lam pang a omte khempeuh a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.47: Ashdod, a khuapite le a khuaneute tawh ahi hi. Gaza, a khuapite le a khuaneute tawh ahi hi. Egypt lui le tuipi lian a gei ciang dong tawh ahi hi.
verses.48: Tua ciangin mual tung gamah Shamir, Jattir, Sokoh,
verses.51: Goshen, Holon le Giloh: khuapi sawm le khat, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.54: Humtah, Kiriath-arba (Hebron a cihna) le Zior: khuapi kua, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.57: Kain, Gibeah le Timnah: khuapi sawm, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.59: Maarath, Beth-anoth le Eltekon: khuapi guk, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.60: Kiriath-baal (Kiriath-jearim a cihna) le Rabbah: khuapi nih, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.62: Nibshan, Ci Khuapi le Engedi: khuapi guk, a khuaneute tawh ahi hi.
verses.63: Ahih hangin Judah mite in Jerusalem-a a teeng Jebus mite hawl khia zo lo uh hi. Tua ahih ciangin tu ni dongin Jebus mite pen Judah mite tawh Jerusalem ah a teeng khawm uh hi.
